backupSeed.needConfirm: You will confirm this phrase on the next screen.
backupSeed.warn: Since only you control your money, you’ll need to save your backup phrase in case this app is deleted or
backupSeed.writeSeed: Please carefully write down these 15 words

confirmBackup.enterCorrect: Please, tap each word in the correct order

createAccount.avatarUnique: This avatar is unique. You cannot change it later.
createAccount.protect: Protect your account with a password or
createAccount.saveUserData: Keep the account on this computer
createAccount.signUp: Sign up for a free account below or

modal.successContent: You cannot change your secret phrase. If you accidentally sent it to someone or suspect that scammers have taken it over, then create a new Waves wallet immediately and transfer your funds to it.
modal.successHeadline: Treat your backup phrase with care!

noBackupNoMoney.description: You must save the secret phrase. It is crucial for accessing your account.

modal.descriptionP1: Waves Platform would like to warn you about the increased frequency of scam and phishing attacks over the last month. Fraudsters are hiding their malware in their own versions of the Waves client and promising bonuses and discounts to lure in users.
modal.descriptionP2: Please be careful and never input your SEED into these 'clients', because your account will be compromised and you will lose all of your funds.
modal.descriptionP3: You should ONLY use the official Waves client.
modal.title: Treat your backup phrase with care!

noBackupNoMoney.title: No Backup, No Money
